io.micronaut.serde.support.serdes

Interface NumberSerde<N extends java.lang.Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - The number type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Deserializer<N>, NullableDeserializer<N>, NullableSerde<N>, Serde<N>, Serializer<N>

    public interface NumberSerde<N extends java.lang.Number>
extends Serde<N>, NullableSerde<N>
    Number serializer that handles formatting.
